meta.name: Aashish Kumar
meta.title: Software Engineer
meta.bio: Dedicated computer science enthusiast with a solid educational background and hands-on experience in web development and database management. Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science, expecting to graduate in July 2025.

Projects.Name: Bank Management System
highlights: It is an ATM simulator which can register new customers of bank and then provide ATM services to them like deposit, withdrawal, balance inquiry etc.

Projects.Name: Library Database
highlights: We created a library database in the backend with SQL and managed it with MS SQL Server as a DBA.

Projects.Name: Static Library Website
highlights: This website is designed for Government Polytechnic Meham college students to access books, handwritten notes, and publications like Bhagwatgeeta and Ramayana, as well as daily Hindi/English newspapers..
